#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<utility>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
pll fab(ll n)
{
	ll a=1;ll b=1;
	while(a+b<n)
	{
		int temp=a;
		a=b;
		b=temp+b;
	}
	return make_pair(b,a+b);
}

int main()
{
	ll a,b;
	
    while(cin>>a>>b)
    {
    	if(!a&&!b)
    	break;
        pll p=fab(a);
        ll count=0;
    	while(p.second<=b)
    	{
    		count++;
    		ll temp=p.first;
    		p.first=p.second;
    		p.second+=temp;
    		
    	}
    	cout<<count<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
